name: mcp-sqlite
description: MCP server providing comprehensive SQLite database interaction capabilities (based on jparkerweb/mcp-sqlite)

tools.name: db_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about the connected database including file path, size, and table count.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables in the database.

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Get detailed information about a table's schema including column names, types, and constraints.

tableName.description: Name of the table to describe

tools.name: create_record
tools.description: Insert a new record into a table.

tools.name: read_records
tools.description: Query records from a table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return

tools.name: update_records
tools.description: Update records in a table that match specified conditions.

conditions.description: Filter conditions to select records to update

tools.name: delete_records
tools.description: Delete records from a table that match specified conditions.

conditions.description: Filter conditions to select records to delete

tools.name: query
tools.description: Execute a custom SQL query against the connected SQLite database. Supports parameterized queries for security.

values.description: Array of parameter values to use in the query
